content: chain 4 loosely and skip 4 stitches single_crochet in the remaining 4 stitches 20 single_crochet 4 chain switch to 6 00 mm j hook round 14 half_double_crochet all around 24 half_double_crochet round 15 single_crochet all around 24 single_crochet round 16 half_double_crochet all around 24 half_double_crochet round 17 single_crochet all around 24 single_crochet round 18 half_double_crochet all around 24 half_double_crochet slip_stitch in the next stitch and finish off weave in ends add button on the side 6
